name: Onager!
description:
Onager! is a physics based game filled with challenging puzzles in fully destructible environment, the goal is to destroy all blue monsters and their lairs using as few shots as possible to gain maximum score, but monsters can be tricky too, do not let them to fool you.

Key features:

  • 2D physics simulation

  • Destructible world

  • Many puzzles are waiting for you, while you're going through the game

  • Steam leaderboard support
